    The interface for the view.

      • setProgressBar

        void setProgressBar(boolean active)
        Enable/disable a progress bar while data is loading.
        Parameters:
        active - true for enable, false for disable.

      • showChart

        void showChart(java.util.List<Observation> observations)
        Show chart.
        Parameters:
        observations - the observations on which to base to chart.

      • setActionListener

        void setActionListener(ObservationsContract.UserActionsListener presenter)
        Set the Presenter on initialisation.
        Parameters:
        presenter - the presenter the view will use.

      • onReady

        void onReady(Station station)
        When the view is initialised.
        Parameters:
        station - the station to load when the view is ready.
